description: Atom-Browser is the plugin to browse the web, preview files, auto-reload, and search Google within Atom
name: atom-browser
readme: Atom-Browser is the plugin to browse the web, preview files, auto-reload, and search Google within Atom

viewShowBackground.title: Show Background
viewShowBackground.description: The default background is dark grey. Enable this for white

viewDefaultLocation.title: Default Location
viewDefaultLocation.description: Choose the default dock location for the Atom Browser: right, left or bottom. (Reload Atom to change the dock location.)
